reports.title: Latest releases
reports.query:
MATCH p=(a:Track)-->(aa:Album) 
RETURN a.name as Track, p as Pattern,aa.name as Album, date(aa.release_date).year as Released
ORDER BY Released ASC  
LIMIT 53

reports.title: Favourite Artists
reports.query:
MATCH p=(aaa:Artist)<--(a:Track)-->(aa:Album) 
RETURN aaa.name as Artist, p as Pattern, a.name as Track, aa.name as Album, date(aa.release_date).year as Released
ORDER BY Released ASC  
LIMIT 533

reports.title: Number of albums by year
reports.query:
MATCH (a:Album)
WITH date(a.release_date).year as year, COUNT(a) as tracks
RETURN year + " " as year, tracks as albums ORDER BY year  ASC SKIP 2

reports.title: Song energy by decade
reports.query:
MATCH (t:Track)--(a:Album)
WITH date(a.release_date).year  / 10 as year, AVG(t.danceability) as energy
RETURN year*10 as year, energy as energy 
ORDER BY year ASC LIMIT 11

reports.title: Artist popularities
reports.query:
MATCH (N:Artist) RETURN N.popularity as popularity, COUNT(N) 
ORDER BY popularity

reports.title: Playlists
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Playlist)
RETURN p.name as name LIMIT 5

MATCH (a:Artist)--(t:Track)
RETURN a.name as artist, t.name as track, t.preview_url as url
LIMIT 200

reports.title: Virtual nodes
reports.query:
WITH 
    apoc.create.vNode(["Person"], {name:"Bob"}) as a,
    apoc.create.vNode(["Person"], {name:"Alice"}) as b
WITH a,b, apoc.create.vRelationship(a,"FRIENDS_WITH",{},b) as c
RETURN a,b,c

reports.title: The multi-use report
reports.query:
MATCH p=(a:Artist)-[:SPOTIFY_RELATES_TO*1..5]-(x)
WHERE a.name = "Stevie Wonder"
WITH x.name as other, min(length(p)) as distance, collect(p) as paths
RETURN other, distance, paths[0] as path
ORDER BY distance ASC

reports.title: The cool line
reports.query:
WITH
   [
     {x:1,y:rand()},
     {x:2,y:rand()},
     {x:3,y:rand()},
     {x:4,y:rand()},
     {x:5,y:rand()},
     {x:6,y:rand()},
     {x:7,y:rand()}
   ]
as array
UNWIND array as a
RETURN a.x, a.y
